page.title: 03KEMERTON VILLAGE ON BREDON
page.content: {Kemerton}is a farming village on the side of{Bredon Hill,}which is part of a range of hills called the{Cotswolds. There are three farms.The main one is Darby's farm.The main livestock are sheep and cattle.Every Wednesday there is a Mothers and Toddlers Group.On Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday and Friday, there is a playgroup in the same place (the village hall.)Kemerton has two shops. One of them is a Post Office. The other is a Newsagents.At the T juntion there is a war memorial for the 1st World War.There is a house called the{Priory.}It has a big garden reserved for flowers which is often open to the public.This year there was a party at the Priory.It was the owner's golden anniversary.There are two Doctors in Kemerton,their names are Dr.Ashbridge and Dr.Stringfellow, they work from the same surgery.
